StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: A pharmacogenetic study of Bipolar Disorder in a Taiwanese Han Chinese population

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
The dataset(s) used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap/cgi-bin/study.cgi? [complete link will be provided] through dbGaP study accession numbers phs[will be provided]. This Data Set was provided by Yuan-Tsong Chen, M.D., Ph.D., and Andrew Tai-Ann Cheng, M.D., Ph.D., D.Sc. and on behalf of the collaborators of A pharmcogenetic study of Bipolar Disorder in a Taiwanese Han Chinese population the study, supported by Academia Sinica, Taiwan (AS 23-23, 52102310023C and Academia Sinica Genomic Medicine Multicenter Study) and National Science Council, Taiwan (National Center for Genomic Medicine NSC101-2319-B-001-001, Translational Resource Center for Genomic Medicine NSC101-2325-B-001-035, and National Research Program for Biopharmaceuticals NSC100-2325-B-001-026 and NSC101-2325-B-001-023).
Yuan-Tsong Chen, M.D., Ph.D., and Andrew Tai-Ann Cheng, M.D., Ph.D., D.Sc. and collaborators request that publications resulting from these data cite their original publication.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Bipolar Disorder, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BPD-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Bipolar Disorder and related disorders.
